languages.text: Спустя месяцы поисков стража Даргонуса отыскала останки Ахиллеаса Скаландра на нижних уровнях улья. Обнаруженные при секретаре записи и артефакты друкари свидетельствовали, что агент Инквизиции был скомпрометирован и работал на ксеносов.

After months of searching, Dargonus wardens found the remains of Achilleas Scalander on the lowest levels of the hive. Drukhari artefacts and records discovered beside him indicated that the agent of the Inquisition had been compromised and was working for the xenos.
languages.original_text: Спустя месяцы поисков стража Даргонуса отыскала останки Ахиллеаса Скаландра на нижних уровнях улья. Обнаруженные при секретаре записи и артефакты друкари свидетельствовали, что агент Инквизиции был скомпрометирован и работал на ксеносов.

traits.locale_text: After months of searching, Dargonus guards found the remains of Achilleas Scalander on the lowest levels of the hive. Drukhari artefacts and records found beside him indicated that the Inquisition agent was compromised and worked for xenos.

After months of searching, Dargonus guards found the remains of Achilleas Scalander on the lowest levels of the hive. Drukhari artefacts and records found beside him indicated that the Inquisition agent was compromised and worked for xenos.

After months of searching, Dargonus guards found the remains of Achilleas Scalander on the lowest levels of the hive. Drukhari artefacts and records found beside him indicated that the agent of the Inquisition was compromised and had been working for the xenos.

After months of searching, Dargonus guards found the remains of Achilleas Scalander on the lowest levels of the hive. Drukhari artefacts and records found beside him indicated that the agent of the Inquisition was compromised and had been working for the xenos.

After months of searching, Dargonus wardens found the remains of Achilleas Scalander on the lowest levels of the hive. Drukhari artefacts and records discovered beside him indicated that the agent of the Inquisition had been compromised and was working for the xenos.

After months of searching, Dargonus wardens found the remains of Achilleas Scalander on the lowest levels of the hive. Drukhari artefacts and records discovered beside him indicated that the agent of the Inquisition had been compromised and was working for the xenos.

languages.text: 经过几个月的搜寻之后，达戈努斯的守卫在巢都最底层发现了阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德的遗体。人们在他身边发现了黑暗灵族的造物与通讯记录，这些证据表明，这位审判庭的特工已然变节，还曾一度为异形效力。
languages.original_text: After months of searching, Dargonus wardens found the remains of Achilleas Scalander on the lowest levels of the hive. Drukhari artefacts and records discovered beside him indicated that the agent of the Inquisition had been compromised and was working for the xenos.

traits.locale_text: 经过几个月的搜寻之后，达戈努斯的守卫在巢都最底层发现了阿吉里亚斯·斯卡兰德的遗体。人们在他身边发现了黑暗灵族的造物与通讯记录，这些证据表明，这位审判庭的特工已然变节，还曾一度为异形效力。

languages.text: Nach monatelanger Suche fanden die Wachen von Dargonus die Überreste von Achilleas Scalander auf den untersten Ebenen der Makropole. Drukhari-Artefakte und -Unterlagen, die bei ihm gefunden wurden, deuteten darauf hin, dass der Agent der Inquisition kompromittiert worden war und mit den Xenos zusammengearbeitet hatte.
languages.original_text: After months of searching, Dargonus wardens found the remains of Achilleas Scalander on the lowest levels of the hive. Drukhari artefacts and records discovered beside him indicated that the agent of the Inquisition had been compromised and was working for the xenos.

traits.locale_text: Nach monatelanger Suche fanden die Wachen von Dargonus die Überreste von Achilleas Scalander auf den untersten Ebenen der Makropole. Drukhari-Artefakte und -Unterlagen, die bei ihm gefunden wurden, deuteten darauf hin, dass der Agent der Inquisition kompromittiert worden war und mit den Xenos zusammengearbeitet hatte.

languages.text: Après des mois de recherches, les gardiens de Dargonus découvrirent la dépouille d'Achilleas Scalander dans l'un des niveaux les plus profonds de la ruche. Les artefacts et archives drukharis trouvés auprès de lui révélèrent la trahison de l'agent de l'Inquisition, qui était passé au service des xénos.
languages.original_text: After months of searching, Dargonus wardens found the remains of Achilleas Scalander on the lowest levels of the hive. Drukhari artefacts and records discovered beside him indicated that the agent of the Inquisition had been compromised and was working for the xenos.

traits.locale_text: Après des mois de recherches, les gardes de Dargonus découvrirent la dépouille d'Achilleas Scalander dans l'un des niveaux les plus profonds de la ruche. Les artefacts et archives drukharis trouvés auprès de lui révélèrent la trahison de l'agent de l'Inquisition, qui était passé au service des xénos.

languages.text: Después de meses de búsqueda, los guardias de Dargonus encontraron los restos de Achilleas Scalander en los niveles más bajos de la colmena. Los artefactos Drukhari y los registros que se descubrieron junto a él indicaron que el agente de la Inquisición había traicionado al Imperium y había estado trabajando para los xenos.
languages.original_text: After months of searching, Dargonus wardens found the remains of Achilleas Scalander on the lowest levels of the hive. Drukhari artefacts and records discovered beside him indicated that the agent of the Inquisition had been compromised and was working for the xenos.

traits.locale_text: Después de meses de búsqueda, los guardias de Dargonus encontraron los restos de Achilleas Scalander en los niveles más bajos de la colmena. Los artefactos Drukhari y los registros que se encontraron junto a él indicaron que el agente de la Inquisición había traicionado al Imperium y había estado trabajando para los xenos.

languages.text: 数カ月に及ぶ捜索の末に、ダルゴナスのワーデンはハイヴの最下層域でアキレアス・スカランダーの遺体を発見した。その傍らで見つかったデュカーリのアーティファクトと記録によって、異端審問庁の一員である彼が内通者となり、異種族のために動いていたことが判明した。
languages.original_text: After months of searching, Dargonus wardens found the remains of Achilleas Scalander on the lowest levels of the hive. Drukhari artefacts and records discovered beside him indicated that the agent of the Inquisition had been compromised and was working for the xenos.

traits.locale_text: 数カ月に及ぶ捜索の末に、ダルゴナスのワーデンはハイヴの最下層域でアキレアス・スカランダーの遺体を発見した。その傍らで見つかったデュカーリのアーティファクトと記録によって、異端審問庁の一員である彼が内通者となり、異種族のために動いていたことが判明した。

languages.text: Dargonus dizdarları, aylarca süren arayışın ardından Achilleas Scalander'ın kalıntılarını kovanın en alt seviyelerinde buldu. Yanında keşfedilen Drukhari eserleri ve kayıtları, Engizisyon ajanının ifşa olduğunu ve zenolara çalıştığını işaret ediyordu.
languages.original_text: After months of searching, Dargonus wardens found the remains of Achilleas Scalander on the lowest levels of the hive. Drukhari artefacts and records discovered beside him indicated that the agent of the Inquisition had been compromised and was working for the xenos.

traits.locale_text: Dargonus dizdarları aylarca süren arayışın ardından Achilleas Scalander'ın kalıntılarını, kovanın en alt seviyelerinde buldular.Yanında keşfedilen Drukhari eserleri ve kayıtları, Engizisyon ajanının ifşa olduğuna ve zenolar için çalıştığına işaret ediyordu.
